definition-item.definition-title: DIGITAL COMPUTERS IN WHICH ALL THE COMPUTATION IS EFFECTED MECHANICALLY (score computers for card games A63F1/18)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Score computers for card games

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Construction of keys, printing mechanisms or other parts of general application to the typewriting or printing art
Keys or printing mechanisms for special applications
G05G, G06K
Computing mechanisms where the output is observed on a scale, like slide rules, are considered analogue computing arrangements
Cash registers

section-body.paragraph-text: G06C3/00 takes precedence over G06C1/00

definition-item.definition-title: Computing aids in which the computing members form at least part of the displayed result and are manipulated directly by hand, e.g. abacuses or pocket adding devices

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for table look-up comprising also computing elements manipulated by hand
Rosaries
Indicating or scoring devices for games or players
Appliances for teaching counting or calculating
Models for scientific, medical, or mathematical purposes

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for table look-up, e.g. menstruation table

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Ovulation period determination in humans
Ovulation period determination in animals

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pin carriage

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Interlocking devices

definition-item.definition-title: Transfer of data from record carrier to computing mechanisms

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Methods or arrangements for sensing record carriers

definition-item.definition-title: Transfer mechanisms, e.g. for transmitting figures from the input mechanism into the computing mechanism (G06C7/10, G06C11/00, G06C15/00 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Places in relation to which this group is residual

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Marking record carriers in general or visual presentation in general of results of the mathematical operations

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for feeding single sheets or continuous web or tape, e.g. ejection device; Line-spacing devices

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Conveying record carriers

definition-item.definition-title: Storage mechanisms (mechanical counters with input only to the lowest order G06M1/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanical counters with input only to the lowest order

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Information storage in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanisms for operating automatically upon more than two numbers otherwise than by repeated addition or subtraction

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for counting the cycles of operation in division or multiplication

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Item-counting devices

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for selection of one out of several counting registers (item-counting devices G06C25/02)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Item-counting devices

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for controlling subsequent operating functions

definition-item.definition-title: Programming-mechanisms for determining the steps to be performed by the computing machine, e.g. when a key or certain keys are depressed (mechanisms merely for producing multiplication by repeated addition G06C15/08)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanisms merely for producing multiplication by repeated addition

section-body.paragraph-text: G06C23/08 takes precedence over G06C23/02 - G06C23/06

definition-item.definition-title: Auxiliary functional arrangements, e.g. interlocks (interlocks in keyboards G06C7/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Interlocks in keyboards
